channel.title: IPL on Week In Memes - What's Going Viral in India?
channel.description: Recent content in IPL on Week In Memes - What's Going Viral in India?

item.title: Malinga No Ball memes
item.description:
Origin

In the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) vs. Mumbai Indians (MI) on Mar 28 2019 at the M.Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru, MI won in the last over. With 7 runs required from the last ball, Malinga bowled what looked like a no-ball but wasn’t called by the umpires.

item.title: Week 006 - RCB, Anushka Sharma, Mission Shakti
item.description: Election season is upon us and so is the IPL. Yet somehow Anushka Sharma managed to creep in with a surprise entry.

item.title: Ashwin Mankad memes
item.description:
Origin

On Mar 25, 2019, in the IPL match between King’s XI Punjab and Rajasthan Royals, Ashwin, the KXIP captain pulled a ‘Mankad’ on Jos Butler which led to a huge social media storm.

item.title: Week 005 - Mankading, Chowkidar, Vivek Oberoi as Modi
item.description: If this post goes up later than usual I blame India for destroying the satellite handling my internet connection. Modi is back in the news with an address to the nation after taking a brief step back thanks to IPL. Let’s recap this week.
